jobDescription: OverviewIn partnership with NYC Health + Hospitals/Jacobi our teams accommodate more than 325,000 outpatient visits, more than 100,000 emergency room visits and more than 20,000 inpatient admissions annually. NYC Health + Hospitals/Jacobi is renowned for The Trauma Center, staffed to treat any traumatic injury or illness, the fully accredited Breast Health Center, and The Burn Center, with more than 40 years of work in burn care. The hospital also serves patients of many other needs. The hospital maintains an academic affiliation with Albert Einstein Medical College of Yeshiva University.ResponsibilitiesSeeking an experienced endocrinologist/ teacher/ scholar to direct the endocrine program, which is an integral part of the Einstein/ Montefiore Endocrine Division. The position involves patient care, administrative duties, teaching of house staff and medical students, supervision of Internal Medicine Residents, Endocrine Fellows, and opportunities for research in collaboration with clinical and basic science faculty of the Albert Einstein College of Medicine. Jacobi Medical Center is an academic medical center providing full services to diverse safety net populations located in modern facilities in a residential section of the Bronx, New York. Successful candidates will be eligible for an academic appointment in the Albert Einstein College of Medicine and competitive compensation.Qualifications Graduate of an approved medical schoolValid NYS license in good standingBoard Certified or Board Eligible EOE M/F/D/V
